Unforgivable.\""},{"lineNumber":18462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我慢してもいーやって思ったけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought maybe I could just bear it,"},{"lineNumber":18463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あたしがレイだったら我慢されたくないから。","translatedEnglishLine":"but if I were Ray, I wouldn't want to be put up with."},{"lineNumber":18464,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうにか出来る手段を考えた」","translatedEnglishLine":"So I came up with a way to fix it.\""},{"lineNumber":18465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前に触られるのが嫌なだけと違うか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't it just that he doesn't want you to touch him?\""},{"lineNumber":18466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だとしたらそう言えってんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If that's the case, he should just say so."},{"lineNumber":18467,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体質を言い訳にはさせねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't let him use his condition as an excuse.\""},{"lineNumber":18468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、かっこいい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-so cool...\""},{"lineNumber":18469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのために、わざわざこんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just for that, you even went through all this trouble...\""},{"lineNumber":18470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはー、じゃあ行ってくる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha-ha! Mary is amazing...\""},{"lineNumber":18473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただのガキの癖に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though she's just a kid...\""},{"lineNumber":18474,"originalJapaneseLine":"それから――――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then――――"},{"lineNumber":18475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーーーーーう！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heyyyyy!\""},{"lineNumber":18476,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レーーーーーイっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Raaaaaay!\""},{"lineNumber":18477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごふっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gof\" (a choking or coughing sound)"},{"lineNumber":18478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、荷運び行こうぜ、荷運びーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C'mon, let's go carry the stuff, carrying the stuff!\""},{"lineNumber":18479,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へいへい……引っ張るんじゃねぇよ、ったく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey hey... don't pull me around, geez...\""},{"lineNumber":18480,"originalJapaneseLine":"少女に文字通り引っ張り回される、","translatedEnglishLine":"It became common to see the Lightning Demon literally dragged around by the girl."},{"lineNumber":18481,"originalJapaneseLine":"雷の魔人の姿が散見されるようになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The figure of the Lightning Demon being pulled about appeared more often."},{"lineNumber":18482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………今度は、実戦？　分かったわよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...This time, actual combat? Got it...\""},{"lineNumber":18483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁっ、はぁっ、か、カチューシャアアァ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah, Ka-Katyushaaa!"},{"lineNumber":18484,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな所でとっ捕まってやがるとはなぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't believe you've been caught in a place like this!\""},{"lineNumber":18485,"originalJapaneseLine":"男が血走った目つきで、扉をこじ開ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"The man with bloodshot eyes forced the door open."},{"lineNumber":18486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方、まさかっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... could it be...!\""},{"lineNumber":18487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、いかん……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, this won't do...!\""},{"lineNumber":18488,"originalJapaneseLine":"男の手には、ぎらりと光るナイフ。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the man's hand was a glinting knife."},{"lineNumber":18489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死ねええええーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Diieeeeーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":18490,"originalJapaneseLine":"男の殺気に、カチューシャは竦んだように","translatedEnglishLine":"The murderous intent from the man made Katyusha flinch."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、うん。できあがりだね。
おめでとう……だけど、それは……？
出来上がりにメアリーが掲げたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary held up the finished product,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供用手袋だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which was a pair of children's gloves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬっふっふ。シィル姉ちゃんには教えよう。
これは……自分で着ける！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is... something I’ll wear myself!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メアリーは手袋をつけた手を、
思いきり高く突き上げた。
「あ、そうなんだ……」
「なんだ貧乏くさい。自分用か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, how cheap. It's for yourself, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とっておきだからな。
早雲さんにめっちゃ強い雷除けのお札を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Souun-san taught me how to write a super strong lightning protection talisman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 書き方教えてもらって、仕込んだ」
「雷除け……てことは……」
「これでレイに触れるぜ。ふふふふ」
メアリーは嬉しそうに、
両手をばすばすと拍ち合わせる。
「あ、あ、そういう……」
「確かにあのビリビリ野郎、
触っただけで感電するが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: electrocutes anyone who just touches him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつ、だからって避けやがる。許せん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But he still dodges me because of that. Unforgivable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我慢してもいーやって思ったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought maybe I could just bear it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたしがレイだったら我慢されたくないから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if I were Ray, I wouldn't want to be put up with.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうにか出来る手段を考えた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I came up with a way to fix it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前に触られるのが嫌なだけと違うか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it just that he doesn't want you to touch him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だとしたらそう言えってんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case, he should just say so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体質を言い訳にはさせねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let him use his condition as an excuse."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、かっこいい……」
「そのために、わざわざこんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just for that, you even went through all this trouble..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはー、じゃあ行ってくる！」
メアリーは勢いよく駆け出していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary dashed off with great energy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか……すごいですね、メアリーさんは……」
「ただのガキの癖に……」
それから――――
「よーーーーーう！
レーーーーーイっ！」
「ごふっ」
「さ、荷運び行こうぜ、荷運びーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "C'mon, let's go carry the stuff, carrying the stuff!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へいへい……引っ張るんじゃねぇよ、ったく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey hey... don't pull me around, geez..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女に文字通り引っ張り回される、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It became common to see the Lightning Demon literally dragged around by the girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷の魔人の姿が散見されるようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The figure of the Lightning Demon being pulled about appeared more often.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………今度は、実戦？　分かったわよ……」
「はぁっ、はぁっ、か、カチューシャアアァ！
こんな所でとっ捕まってやがるとはなぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't believe you've been caught in a place like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男が血走った目つきで、扉をこじ開ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The man with bloodshot eyes forced the door open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方、まさかっ……！」
「なっ、いかん……！」
男の手には、ぎらりと光るナイフ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the man's hand was a glinting knife.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死ねええええーーーーッ！」
男の殺気に、カチューシャは竦んだように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The murderous intent from the man made Katyusha flinch.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
